text: What does it do? Match you at worse odds with betfair on the other side?

elements.text: What does it do? Match you at worse odds with betfair on the other side?

text:
```We've implemented smart logic in the backend to protect your bet from large price movements. This means that, in rare cases, MatchMe bets will be placed as a normal unmatched bet at the original price you requested.```
The smart logic seems to be just a price x ticks lower than the best price but my understanding is that if it isn't matched it becomes an unmatched bet at the price you asked for

elements.text: We've implemented smart logic in the backend to protect your bet from large price movements. This means that, in rare cases, MatchMe bets will be placed as a normal unmatched bet at the original price you requested.
The smart logic seems to be just a price x ticks lower than the best price but my understanding is that if it isn't matched it becomes an unmatched bet at the price you asked for
